org.apache.james.mailbox.store.mail

Interface ModSeqProvider<Id>

  • Type Parameters:
    Id -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLockingModSeqProvider, HBaseModSeqProvider, InMemoryModSeqProvider, JCRModSeqProvider, JPAModSeqProvider, MaildirStore

    public interface ModSeqProvider<Id>
    Take care of provide mod-seqences for a given Mailbox. Be aware that implementations need to be thread-safe!

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long highestModSeq(MailboxSession session, Mailbox<Id> mailbox)
      Return the highest mod-sequence which were used for the Mailbox
      long nextModSeq(MailboxSession session, Mailbox<Id> mailbox)
      Return the next mod-sequence which can be used for the Mailbox.

    • Method Detail

      • nextModSeq

        long nextModSeq(MailboxSession session,
              Mailbox<Id> mailbox)
                throws MailboxException
        Return the next mod-sequence which can be used for the Mailbox. Its important that the returned mod-sequence is higher then the last used and that the next call of this method does return a higher one. The first mod-seq must be >= 1
        Parameters:
        session -
        mailbox -
        Returns:
        modSeq
        Throws:
        MailboxException

      • highestModSeq

        long highestModSeq(MailboxSession session,
                 Mailbox<Id> mailbox)
                   throws MailboxException
        Return the highest mod-sequence which were used for the Mailbox
        Parameters:
        session -
        mailbox -
        Returns:
        highest
        Throws:
        MailboxException
